modName: A spell help you teleport to Hassildor
summary: A simple spell to make you transfer to Hassildor and recall back to the previous spot.
descriptionHtml:
First of all, sorry for my bad English.

This mod is a plugin to Hassildor - Player home for Vampires by Elianora&Nahkin. You should download the amazing mod first by this link:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52057/?

My mod provide a spell which helps you transfer to Hassildor and recall back to the spot where you were from. And you can find a SpellTome in Hassildor.

I haven't found any bug so far, but if you find, please let me know, thanks.

Credits:

Elianora & Nahkin - The author of Hassildor - Player home for Vampires.And the picture also comes from their mod.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52057/?

anano - His mod inspired me a lot.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26442/?

Bethesda - One of my favorite video game companies. Well,I have to admit I don't like ESO.

Valve - if not by steam, I can't buy and play Skyrim, thank you Valve!
author: Istari
